DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of other action taken as a result of the event that are unrelated to dose adjustments of the study treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Other Actions taken in Response to Adverse Event
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s)._An indication or description of an other action taken in response to an adverse event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, syndrome, or disease, temporally associated with the use of a medical product or procedure, regardless of whether or not it is considered related to the product or procedure (attribution of unrelated, unlikely, possible, probable, or definite). The concept refers to events that could be medical product related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another therapy or procedure, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation. The term also is referred to as an adverse experience. The old term Side Effect is retired and should not be used.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredName: Other Actions taken in Response to Adverse Event
Property.preferredDefinition: An indication or description of an other action taken in response to an adverse event.

Concepts.longName: Other Actions taken in Response to Adverse Event
Concepts.definition: An indication or description of an other action taken in response to an adverse event.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record all other action(s) taken resulting from the adverse event that are unrelated to study treatments or other non-study treatments given because of this adverse event.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This field is usually collected as a free text field. If possible/desired, the sponsor can create controlled terminology (e.g., Treatment Unblinded, Primary Care Physician Notified).
